verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ho-ho-ho-san-na, Ho-ho-ho-san-na.
Ho-ho-ho-san-na, Jesus is the King. (Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We lift You up, O Lord, for You are marvelous.
Let all the angels worship You!
We lift You up, O Lord, for You are marvelous.
Exalt Him all His saints!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O, Sing praises to the Lord.
Blessed be the name of our God. (Repeat.)
